thread.title: Tesla’s Gigafactory starts mass producing battery cells
thread.title_full: Tesla’s Gigafactory starts mass producing battery cells

author: Pollyanna
title: Tesla’s Gigafactory starts mass producing battery cells
text:
By Darrell Etherington 
Tesla’s massive Nevada Gigafactory has started producing lithium-ion battery cells in mass capacity, with the aim of supplying products including the upcoming Model 3 electric vehicle and the Powerwall 2 home energy supply unit, and the Powerpack 2 commercial solar energy storage product. It’s a big step for the automaker, since production volume of the batteries it produces… Read More
